paragraph_1:
Dr. & Mrs. Sivakumaran and Mr. & Mrs. Sritharan
Cordially request the pleasure of the company of you and your family
On the occasion of the marriage of
paragraph_2:
On the Sunday of 13th September 2026 between
11:30 am and 1:00 pm at
The Grand 90 Cathies Lane, Wantirna South, Victoria 3152, Australia
and kindly join us for Lunch thereafter.
your_presence:
Your presence and blessing are our happiness.
We kindly request no boxed gifts.
